change.changenote: Section 4 was enacted by BC Reg 291/2016, effective January 23, 2017.
Section 4 (g) was added by BC Reg 305/2021, effective November 29, 2021.
Section 4.1 was enacted by BC Reg 105/2021, effective April 7, 2021.
Section 4.1 BEFORE self-repealed by BC Reg 611/76, effective June 6, 2021.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The liquor prescribed for the purposes of the definition of manufacture in section 1 (1) of the Liquor Distribution Act is draught beer that a licensee encloses in a container under sections 9.1 (1) (b.1) and 16.1 (1) (b.1) of the Liquor Control and Licensing Regulation.
This section is repealed 60 days after the date on which this section comes into force.

change.changenote: Section 4.2 was enacted by BC Reg 180/2021, effective July 8, 2021.
Section 5 was enacted by BC Reg 291/2016, effective January 23, 2017.
